commitMessage:
@@@SOLR-15089: Allow backup/restoration to Amazon's S3 blobstore (#120)

See solr/contrib/s3-repository/README.md for more information.

Co-authored-by: Andy Throgmorton <athrogmorton@salesforce.com>

@@@SOLR-15599: Upgrade AWS SDK from v1 to v2 (#271)

Also removed woodstox-core-asl dependency.  and replaced with com.fasterxml.woodstox:woodstox-core:6.2.4.  the newer version of the dependency.
